newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Costello says wants lower bank margins and fees.
newsitem.headline: Costello says wants lower bank margins and fees.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said on Thursday that the government wanted lower bank margins and fees, with a focus on greater competition to challenge the big four local banks.

"We are not going to insist that there be big subsidisation through high margins as was the case in the past," Costello told Australian Broadcasting Corp radio in an interview which centred on the report by the Wallis inquiry into the financial system.
"We are going to jawbone down those fees and we are going to allow new entrants that will drive, by competition, the fees down," he said. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
